title: why am i having so many problems with shaco
body: well first i found out that I have to rebuy shaco and now Im gonna get banned (in process right now of uninstalling) because im about to load in and it says that i am missing files for shaco.  Im already on the 5 game low tier for not being able to connect to riots crappy servers(as you can tell im mad) and now i have to reinstall right b4 a game woopidy fucking doo see you guys in a couple days{{champion:83}}
